DataElement.preferredName: Risk Factor Deceased Sibling Cause of Death Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text field to describe any circumstance or condition that resulted in the death of legal or consanguineous brother or sister who died that could contribute to an increased likelihood that the newborn would have the same circumstance or condition.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Risk Factor Deceased Sibling Cause of Death
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any aspect of an individual's life, behavior, an environmental exposure, or an inborn or inherited characteristic that increases the likelihood of a disease, condition or injury._The historical fact that a legal or consanguineous brother or sister has died.:The circumstance or condition that results in the death of a living being.
